title: Financial Structure, Firm Size and Financial Growth of Non-Financial Firms Listed at the Nairobi Securities Exchange. (arXiv:2303.10910v1 [q-fin.GN])
abstract: A significant number of the non-financial firms listed at the Nairobi Securities Exchange have been experiencing declining financial performance and financial growth, which deter investors from investing in such firms. Hence, the study aimed at establishing the effect of financial structure on the financial growth of non-financial firms listed at the Nairobi Securities Exchange.
context:
Title: Financial Structure, Firm Size and Financial Growth of Non-Financial Firms Listed at the Nairobi Securities Exchange. (arXiv:2303.10910v1 [q-fin.GN])
Abstract: A significant number of the non-financial firms listed at the Nairobi Securities Exchange have been experiencing declining financial performance and financial growth, which deter investors from investing in such firms. Hence, the study aimed at establishing the effect of financial structure on the financial growth of non-financial firms listed at the Nairobi Securities Exchange.
translated_title: 非金融公司的财务结构、公司规模和财务增长：以内罗毕证券交易所上市公司为例
translated_abstract: 内罗毕证券交易所上市的大量非金融公司的财务表现和财务增长一直在下降，这阻碍了投资者对这样的公司的投资。因此，这项研究旨在确定财务结构对内罗毕证券交易所上市非金融公司的财务增长的影响。
tldr: 本研究旨在了解财务结构对内罗毕证券交易所上市的非金融公司的财务增长的影响。
en_tdlr: This study aims to investigate the impact of financial structure on the financial growth of non-financial firms listed at the Nairobi Securities Exchange.
